official_title: Pitavastatin to REduce Physical Function Impairment and FRailty in HIV (PREPARE)
inclusion_criteria:
* Ambulatory participants enrolled in both REPRIEVE (A5332) and its Mechanistic Substudy (A5333s) or ambulatory participants who are newly enrolling into REPRIEVE (A5332) at A5333s ACTG sites.
Healthy volunteers allowed
Must have minimum age of 40 Years
Must have maximum age of 75 Years
exclusion_criteria: * Inability to ambulate independently (use of a cane or a walker is permitted) or rise from a chair without assistance.
